description: These crisp and golden coconut prawns cooked in the air fryer for a lighter finish without added oil.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Pescatarian,Air fryer,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free
name: Air Fryer Coconut Crusted Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the flour out on a plate. Whisk the coconut and panko breadcrumbs together in a shallow dish. Add the eggs to a shallow dish and beat lightly.
Dip each prawn in flour, then egg, then coconut mix. Place the prawns in the basket of an air fryer in a single layer. Cook at 200Â°C for 10-12 minutes until golden.
Mix the mayonnaise and sriracha sauce together in a small bowl and serve with the prawns.
